DOC.brief_summary: If allergic ragweed , take certain medication , ask blood drawn . We perform experiment blood cell .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Xolair Inhibiting Leukotriene Cytokine ( IL-4 IL-13 ) Release From Blood Basophils
DOC.detailed_description: Adult ragweed allergic subject blood drawn . Basophils enrich stimulate allergen control . Supernatants stimulation assay cytokine histamine .
DOC.criteria: Ages 19 50 At least 2 year history ragweed allergic rhinitis Positive skin prick test ragweed > 5 mm wheal diameter IgE < 700 iU/m Use prohibit medication ( e.g . antihistamine past 7 day topical oral corticosteroid past 1 month , betaagonist theophylline 2 day . History immunotherapy past 2 year Exposure Omalizumab past 2 year Clinically significant nonallergic perennial rhinitis avoid mediator release due environmental allergen Asthma mild intermittent Women childbearing potential accepted form birth control , well woman breastfeed Known sensitivity study drug Xolair Patients severe medical condition ( ) view investigator prohibit participation study Patients previous history cancer Use investigational agent last 30 day
